attributes.action: Ban mobiles talks and loud music in trains
attributes.additional_details: Milliond of people travel everyday in  trains and buses for work.But trains are getting so noisy by some peopel who are using peopel and talking to loud with their friends and family.Although trains display warning but nobody bother.Train travel is becoming a mental torture and people can not travel in peace.You can imagine senior people and school kids who are disturbed most.we need lot of quite zones in trains and ban on mobile during train travel.Or seperatet areas for people to make phone calls.Imagine in London where trains are full of people and then noise they making,is a mental tortue for common people.They dont have any option.
